artist: Artist: After Pietro Perugino; Designer: G. Canuti; Engraver: Giuseppe Rosaspina
description: Blessed Virgin seated on a cloud holding child in an arch with an angel on either side; below in a landscape St. Michael the Archangel, St. Catherine with wheel at feet behind her, St. Appolonia and St. John the Evangelist
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on sheet in black : P Vannucci/ delo Perugino/ sip.  G. Canuti dis  G. Rosaspina inc. / B.VERFINE LI SANTI MICHELE ARC\'LO: GIO: EVANGELISTA/ CATTARINA. E APOLLONIA | on sheet in pencil: 2-87
title: Blessed Virgin with Saints Michael the Archangel, John the Evangelist, Catherine and Appollonia
